      • registerNewClient

        public java.lang.String registerNewClient(java.lang.String account,
                                          java.lang.String pw,
                                          java.lang.String email)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method used to register a new user, if that user is already registered, the system warns him. If he is not registered, the method store his credentials in the database
        Parameters:
        account -
        pw -
        email -
        Returns:
        Return one of two strings, it advise you if you are already registered or if you has been registered
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
